member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonObjectId
member.summary: Represents a BSON Oid (object id).

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonObjectId.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the Oid.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonObjectId.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader
member.summary: Represents a reader that provides fast, non-cached, forward-only access to serialized JSON data.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.JsonNet35BinaryCompatibility
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether binary data reading should compatible with incorrect Json.NET 3.5 written binary.
member.value: true if binary data reading will be compatible with incorrect Json.NET 3.5 written binary; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.ReadRootValueAsArray
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the root object will be read as a JSON array.
member.value: true if the root object will be read as a JSON array; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.DateTimeKindHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets the used when reading values from BSON.
member.value: The used when reading values from BSON.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.#ctor(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean,System.DateTimeKind)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true the root object will be read as a JSON array.
The used when reading values from BSON.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.#ctor(System.IO.BinaryReader,System.Boolean,System.DateTimeKind)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true the root object will be read as a JSON array.
The used when reading values from BSON.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.Read
member.summary: Reads the next JSON token from the stream.
member.returns: true if the next token was read successfully; false if there are no more tokens to read.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonReader.Close
member.summary: Changes the to Closed.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter
member.summary: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way of generating JSON data.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.DateTimeKindHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets the used when writing values to BSON. When set to no conversion will occur.
member.value: The used when writing values to BSON.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.#ctor(System.IO.BinaryWriter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.Flush
member.summary: Flushes whatever is in the buffer to the underlying streams and also flushes the underlying stream.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteEnd(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonToken)
member.summary: Writes the end.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteComment(System.String)
member.summary: Writes out a comment /*...*/ containing the specified text.
member.param: Text to place inside the comment.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteStartConstructor(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the start of a constructor with the given name.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteRaw(System.String)
member.summary: Writes raw JSON.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.String)
member.summary: Writes raw JSON where a value is expected and updates the writer's state.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteStartArray
member.summary: Writes the beginning of a JSON array.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteStartObject
member.summary: Writes the beginning of a JSON object.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WritePropertyName(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the property name of a name/value pair on a JSON object.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.Close
member.summary: Closes this stream and the underlying stream.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Writes a value. An error will raised if the value cannot be written as a single JSON token.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteNull
member.summary: Writes a null value.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteUndefined
member.summary: Writes an undefined value.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteValue(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a value.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Bson.BsonWriter.WriteValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a value.
